From: "Eric Riou du Cosquer" <eri@...>

Hello,

I am using the TestRunner class of swingui.
I wanted to get the attribute fTestResult from my class which extends
TestRunner but it is impossible because it is a private attribute.
Is there another way to get the lists of errors, failures, and succes of my
test ?

Thank u 4 your help !

Eric
subject: How to get the TestResult after an execution
